### **Working as a Student**

How many hours can I work per week as an international student?
Max 20 hours/week. Non-EU students are limited to 120 full/240 half days yearly, except for research assistant roles.

Is there a minimum wage in Germany?
Yes! Since January 2024, it’s €12.41/hour. Always sign a contract first—see Make it in Germany (https://www.make-it-in-germany.com/de/arbeiten-in-deutschland/arbeitswelt/arbeitsvertrag).

No, non-EU students can’t freelance. Check with UTN’s Welcome Center or local immigration office for job rules.
